entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Snow level rising to 1000 metres near noon. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to wet flurries and rain showers near midnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of wet flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of wet flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
